Package xyz.kazuthecat.coffeebot.settings

Class SingleSetting

  • java.lang.Object
    • xyz.kazuthecat.coffeebot.settings.SingleSetting
  • public class SingleSetting
extends java.lang.Object
    A class which holds a specific setting, handles changes to that setting and so on. A single function can have many settings and thus many of these objects.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      SingleSetting​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String defaultValue, boolean userChangeable, boolean adminChangeable)
      Constructor for the class.

      Retrieves the most relevant setting value.
      boolean isAdminChangeable()
      Check whether the setting can be changed on a per-guild basis.

      Check whether the setting can be changed on a per-user basis.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SingleSetting

        public SingleSetting​(java.lang.String name,
                     java.lang.String defaultValue,
                     boolean userChangeable,
                     boolean adminChangeable)
        Constructor for the class.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the setting (e.q. "ping.response")
        defaultValue - Default value for the setting.
        userChangeable - Boolean indicating whether users are allowed to change this setting for themselves.
        adminChangeable - Boolean indicating whether admins are allowed to change this setting for their guild.

    • Method Detail

      • getSetting

        public java.lang.String getSetting​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.User user,
                                   net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Guild guild)
        Retrieves the most relevant setting value. First checks for user settings, then for guild settings and finally returns the default value if none is found.
        Parameters:
        user - The user who triggered the command.
        guild - The guild in which it was triggered.
        Returns:
        The setting value.

      • putGuildSetting

        public SettingEnum putGuildSetting​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Guild guild,
                                   java.lang.String value)
        Change the setting for a guild.
        Parameters:
        guild - The guild whose setting we're changing.
        value - The value we're assigning to the setting.
        Returns:
        SettingEnum indicating whether the operation was successful.

      • putUserSetting

        public SettingEnum putUserSetting​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.User user,
                                  java.lang.String value)
        Change the setting for a single user.
        Parameters:
        user - The user whose setting we're changing.
        value - The value we're assigning to the setting.
        Returns:
        SettingEnum indicating whether the operation was successful.

      • getDefaultValue

        public java.lang.String getDefaultValue()
        Retrieve the default value for the setting.
        Returns:
        String value containing the default value for the setting.

      • isUserChangeable

        public boolean isUserChangeable()
        Check whether the setting can be changed on a per-user basis.
        Returns:
        Boolean value indicating whether the setting can be changed on a per-user basis.

      • isAdminChangeable

        public boolean isAdminChangeable()
        Check whether the setting can be changed on a per-guild basis.
        Returns:
        Boolean value indicating whether the setting can be changed on a per-guild basis.
